name: Ninja Wars (GuildGames)
description:
Ninja wars is the story of a young Ninja on a quest to restore peace to the ninja world.

Joins millions of people around the world in this classic Ninja warrior game.

Fight against the female ninja clan as revenge for the lost souls of your brothers

New Features:
● Boss Level
● Awesome Power ups

Classic Features:
● Fight as many Ninjas as you can to unlock Bosses and other cool features
● Test your survival skills
● Test your patience levels as the enemies just won't let up
● Defend yourself with many cool weapons
● Fight against the Ninja Queens
and Lots More
